17:33 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:50 <boubou> hola guys  
17:50 <boubou> HTTP Status 500 - com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException: Error number 11007 in 0: Failed to extract Entity Resource Reference from URL [http://IP:8080/xwiki-enterprise-web-8.0/bin/view/Main/]  
17:50 <boubou> I looked on Google and it looks like a bug  
17:50 <boubou> am I right ?  
17:51 <boubou> I deployed the war using Tomcat  
17:51 <boubou> on a Centos7 server  
17:51 <ClemensR> better deploy the war as xwiki.war, not with the original file name  
17:51 <vmassol> has quit  
17:52 <ClemensR> tomcat is unhappy if the file name contains a dot, sometimes  
17:52 <ClemensR> and xwiki might be somewhat unhappy, too, but I guess that might count as a bug  
17:52 <boubou> should I just rename the file without a . ?  
17:54 <ClemensR> yes, simplest would be just to rename it to xwiki.war  
18:04 <boubou> same issue  
18:05 <boubou> xwikienterprise80.war  
18:08 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:11 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:16 <ClemensR> ah, wait, do you get any errors on startup in catalina.out? probably the database connection failed  
18:17 <ClemensR> error page might talk about problems with db connection if you scroll down
